QuestData.Title: The Best Honey In Vol'dun
QuestData.Description:
If you can handle rescuin' de others by yourself, Zulsan and I will head back to de inn and start cleanin' up de place.
Don't worry, I still be cookin' up a special batch of my famous scorpid blood drinks for you.
In fact, you gonna be runnin' right past my friend Rikati. He sells de best honey in all of Vol'dun!
Bring back a few bottles of it for me and let's add some sweetness to de drinks!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Rikati at The Four Stingers.
